questions.question: Analog signals have continuous electrical signals.
A 4-bit R/2R digital-to-analog (DAC) converter has a reference of 5 volts. What is the analog output for the input code (B<sub>3</sub>, B<sub>2</sub>, B<sub>1</sub>, B<sub>0</sub>) = 0011.
Determine the resolution and full scale output of 4-bit weighted resistor DAC with a reference of 10 volts.

answers.a: Resolution=1.25 V, Full scale voltage=18.75 V
answers.b: Resolution=2.5 V, Full scale voltage=18.75 V
answers.c: Resolution=5 V, Full scale voltage=18.25 V
